title: Wild bear on the loose in New Jersey
text:
Wild bear on the loose in New Jersey 12:36am IST - 01:18
A wild black bear was spotted wandered through the neighborhoods of Paramus, New Jersey, on Tuesday, after escaping police the day before. Authorities are asking residents to call 911 if they see the bear. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
A wild black bear was spotted wandered through the neighborhoods of Paramus, New Jersey, on Tuesday, after escaping police the day before. Authorities are asking residents to call 911 if they see the bear. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
